resumes.resume_text: Alice is a data analytics student skilled in Python, SQL, and Tableau. She has done projects on sales forecasting and data visualization.
Brian is an Information Systems student with experience in Java, C++, and backend development. He contributed to a web app project for e-commerce.
Chloe has experience in machine learning and AI, familiar with Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow. She worked on predicting housing prices.
Daniel is a student skilled in SQL, data cleaning, and dashboard building. He interned at a fintech company analyzing customer data.
Emily specializes in front-end development with React and Vue. She also has basic Python skills for data analysis projects.
Farhan is interested in cloud computing and devops. He knows Python, AWS, and Docker, and contributed to a CI/CD pipeline project.
Grace focuses on natural language processing. She has experience in Python, spaCy, and building chatbots for academic projects.
Hassan is skilled in data visualization using Python, Tableau, and Power BI. He analyzed sales and marketing data for a student consultancy.
Isabella has experience in backend APIs with Node.js and Python. She also worked with PostgreSQL databases and data ETL pipelines.
Jason focuses on AI and computer vision projects using Python and OpenCV. He built an image classification model for a university project.
Karen is experienced in business analytics, Python, and SQL. She conducted data-driven research for a market research project.
Leo has worked on mobile app development using Flutter and React Native. He also has Python skills for data handling.
Maya focuses on data science and machine learning. She worked on predicting customer churn and implementing recommendation systems.
Nadia has experience in SQL, Python, and Power BI. She built dashboards for student-led research projects.
Oliver is skilled in Python, R, and statistical modeling. He analyzed survey datasets for university projects.
Aaron is a Business student skilled in marketing strategies, project management, and data-driven decision making.
Beth studies Economics with experience in financial modeling, market research, and econometrics projects.
Cynthia focuses on Social Science research. She has skills in survey design, data analysis with Excel and SPSS, and qualitative research.
David is a Business Analytics student skilled in Excel, SQL, and data visualization using Tableau and Power BI.
Ella studies Psychology and has experience in behavioral studies, data collection, and analysis using Python for experimental data.

githubs.chunk_text: GitHub repo for sales forecasting project using Python and pandas. Includes scripts for data cleaning and visualization.
GitHub repo for ML housing price prediction. Uses scikit-learn pipelines and regression models.
Front-end project repo with React components and visualization dashboards.
NLP chatbot project using Python and spaCy for intent recognition.
Computer vision repo with OpenCV image classification models.
ML project predicting customer churn and building recommendation systems.
